column4: I'm a java and c++ developer, using also Qt (4), svn, and so on - but when I type gcc or g++ or java, it says command not found - is there somehwere a tutorial which tells me what I need and how I can install them (and what I dont need) - since I dont want to install everything which looks good but I will never use...
you need to "sudo apt-get install build-essential"
you all need the java sdk
